snippet.title: Cosmic Payback - New 3D game on ZX Spectrum
snippet.description:
Cosmic Payback is a 3-D platform/maze game for the 48K/128K ZX Spectrum. Bounce your way through 15 different levels of challenging gameplay. This game marks the introduction of "Mode 6" - a new 3-D rendering algorithm that allows for texture-filled scrollable maps to be animated at very good speeds.

Download the game here: https://www.connosoft.com/software/cosmicpb.html
Alternatively, you can buy an extended version in physical and digital form from Bitmap Soft, by visiting their website: https://www.bitmapsoft.co.uk/product/cosmic-payback/
